mapper.insert: insert into t_honour (honour_id, `name`, description, `status`, create_time, update_time, dr) values (#{honourId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into t_honour
honour_id,
`name`,
description,
`status`,
create_time,
update_time,
dr,
#{honourId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update t_honour
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where honour_id = #{honourId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_honour set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where honour_id = #{honourId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_honour where 1 = 1
and trim(replace(`name` ,' ','')) like trim(replace ('%' #{name,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' ,' ',''))
and status = #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}
select count(honourId) from t_honour where `name` = #{name, jdbcType=CHAR}
